QueryResult.text: SELECT R.ID RESOURCE_ID, E.ENTITY, E.DESCRIPTION ENTITY_NAME, L.LOCATIONID LOCATION, L.LOCATIONDESCRIPTION LOCATION_NAME, D.DEPARTCODE DEPARTMENT, D.DESCRIPTION DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM PAC_MNT_RESOURCES R, LOCATIONS L, ENTITY E, DEPARTMENTS D WHERE R.ID > 0 AND R.LOCATIONID = L.LOCATIONID AND L.ENTITY = E.ENTITY AND R.DEPARTCODE = D.DEPARTCODE
